error_alert_text: Something went wrong! Please try again.
token_expired_alert_text: Please log in again to continue.
name: Name
verify_email_address: We sent you an email with an the verification link.
select_oils: To compose an aroma mixture, select the oils you are interested in one by one, the calculator will highlight favorable combinations.
volatility_reminder: Light oils evaporate faster and the composition changes its aroma over time. It is worth adding at least one oil from each volatility class.
property_notice: Select the required properties of oils for the manufacture of cosmetics. Remember that oils can cause severe allergies.
calculator_tagline: Create a harmonious aroma composition with the essential oils calculator
calculator_description: The Essential Oil Calculator will help you compose aroma composition based on the complementarity table and your preferences
handbook_tagline: Use a guide to properly use essential oils
handbook_description: The handbook describes aromas, useful properties, methods of application, contraindications and combinations of essential oils
